response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This unique item is priced at $1,200,000, which I believe is a fair and generous offer considering its worth to you.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that this product will significantly enhance your experience and bring you great satisfaction.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
